name: Cool Mayor
description:
Update: Android Executable added!!!

"Cool Mayor" is a political  game where your role is  the mayor of a city and you need to take decisions about the issues that come up.

You get to manage the four pillars of society: Social appeal , Religion, Security and Economy with your reaction at the different dilemmas the city faces. Your goal is to survive in the world of politics for as long as you can.
